name: pnp-devproxy-demo-m365-randomerror-js
title: Demo: Simulate random error responses from Microsoft 365 APIs
shortDescription: This sample contains a demo web application connected to Microsoft Graph. Using Dev Proxy, you can simulate random errors returned by Microsoft Graph and see how the app handles them.
longDescription: This sample contains a demo web application connected to Microsoft Graph. Using Dev Proxy, you can simulate random errors returned by Microsoft Graph and see how the app handles them.

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of a web browser with the web app running. Dev tools open with console window full of errors

references.name: Simulate errors from Microsoft Graph APIs
references.description: Learn how to use the Dev Proxy to simulate errors from Microsoft Graph APIs.

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.
